text: Östen Warnerbring, born 22 November 1934, died 18 January 2006, was a Swedish singer, musician, composer and lyricist. He represented Sweden in the Eurovision Song Contest 1967 with the song Som en dröm. The music was written by Marcus Österdahl & Curt Pettersson. The lyrics were written by Patrice Hellberg. == References == ==Other websites== Category:1934 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Swedish singers
title: Östen Warnerbring
